<script>
   var navigationOptions = {
     language : 'pt',
     otherLocation: "http://www.nba.com/gr/reflectIntl.html?gr=portugueseuw&page=www&dur=ses",
     usLocation : "http://www.nba.com/gr/reflectIntl.html?gr=portugueseuw&page=www&&dur=1w",
     optionText : "NBA.portuguese",
     editionCookie: "pt_hp"
   }
</script>

<!-- End Licensee Header Scripts Fragment -->

<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div       window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div <!-- END SSI fork for esi or beo -->

<!-- End licensee_global_navigation -->
       <!--SSI /frags/licensee_content_top_banner.html -->
       <!-- Start Licensee Content Top Banner Fragment -->


<!-- SSI fork for esi or beo -->


<!--BEGIN content for url: http://sportv.globo.com/servico/sportv/nba/ad_banner.html-->

<!-- END SSI fork for esi or beo -->



<!-- End Licensee Content Top Banner Fragment -->           
      </div>
      
      <div class='nba-container-wrapper' >
      
        <div class='main-nav-container' data-ng-show="showNav" data-ng-class="{'container': !fullWidthNav}">

          <!-- Start Licensee Content Site Navigation Fragment -->

        </div>         

        <div class="container" id="main-container">
            
          <div class="row container-row">
          
            <div class="col-xl-2 visible-xl text-right content-aside content-aside-left" data-ng-hide="mobileAppViewMode">

            </div>  <!-- /page-wrapper -->
  
            <div class="col-xl-8 col-lg-12 content-container">
            
              <div class='content-container-top' data-ng-show="showNav">                         
                <!--SSI /frags/licensee_content_top_promos.html -->
                <!-- Start Licensee Content Top Promos Fragment -->
<!-- End Licensee Content Top Promos Fragment -->                  
              </div>
  
              <div class='content'>
                <!-- Start content -->
                  <div class='league-schedule-section'  data-ng-controller="SchedulePageCtrl">
  <sib-page-header data-sib-title="_page.schedule"></sib-page-header>
  <div class="row">
    <div class="col-12" style="float: none;">
      <div class="sib-custom sib-custom-schedule-header" data-ng-controller="ScheduleHeaderCtrl" data-ng-cloak>
  <div class="row header-wrap">
    <div class="col-lg-6 col-sm-6 col-12 content-left">
      <div class="quicklinks" >
        <i class="icon-caret-left" data-ng-class="scheduleType" data-ng-click="changeMonth('prev')" ></i>
          <span data-ng-show="scheduleType == 'day'">{{activeDate | date:'mediumDate'}}</span>  
          <span data-ng-show="scheduleType == 'days'">{{startDate | date:'mediumDate'}} - {{endDate | date:'mediumDate'}}</span>
          <span data-ng-show="scheduleType == 'month'">{{activeDate | date:'monthYear'}}</span> 
        <i class="icon-caret-right" data-ng-class="scheduleType"  data-ng-click="changeMonth('next')"></i>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-lg-6 col-sm-6 col-12 content-right">
      <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="calendar-button" data-ng-class="{toggled: contentDrop=='calendar'}" data-ng-click="clickcalendar()"><span data-ng-i18next="schedule.calendar"></span><i class="icon-calendar" data-ng-hide="contentDrop=='calendar'"></i><i class="icon-remove" data-ng-show="contentDrop=='calendar'"></i></a>
      <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="select-team-button" data-ng-class="{toggled: contentDrop=='teams'}" data-ng-click="clickteam()"><span data-ng-i18next="schedule.selectTeam"></span><i class="icon-list-alt" data-ng-hide="contentDrop=='teams'"></i><i class="icon-remove" data-ng-show="contentDrop=='teams'"></i></a>
    </div>
  </div>
  
  <div class="row">
    <div class="col-12">
      <div class="calendar-drop" data-ng-show="contentDrop=='calendar'">
        <div data-ng-controller="CalendarCtrl" data-ng-cloak>
  <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="prev-month" data-ng-click="clickLeft()"><i class="icon-caret-left"></i></a>
  <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="next-month" data-ng-click="clickRight()"><i class="icon-caret-right"></i></a>
  <sib-calendar month-index="offsets[0]" cal-position="'left'" active-date="activeDate"></sib-calendar>
  <sib-calendar month-index="offsets[1]" cal-position="'center'" active-date="activeDate"></sib-calendar>
  <sib-calendar month-index="offsets[2]" cal-position="'right'" active-date="activeDate"></sib-calendar>
</div>      </div>
      <div class="team-drop" data-ng-show="contentDrop=='teams'">
        <div class="row" data-ng-controller="TeamListCtrl">
  <div class="col-12 conferenceholder" data-ng-repeat="(conferenceKey, conference) in conferences">
    <div class="row conference">
      <div class="col-12 conference-title">
        <h4>{{'allTeams.' + conferenceKey.toLowerCase()|i18next}} {{'allTeams.conferenceTitle'|i18next}}</h4>
      </div>
      <div class="row" data-ng-repeat="(key, division) in conference.divisions">
        <div class="team" data-ng-repeat="team in division">
            <a data-ng-href="/teams/schedule/#!/{{ team.code }}">
              <sib-img-team team-abbr="team.abbr | earlyTeamChange:'imgAbbr'"></sib-img-team> <!--  this is only when the schedule is released, need to make the earlyTeamChange smarter -->
            </a>
            <a class="hidden-sm" data-ng-href="/teams/schedule/#!/{{ team.code }}">
              <!-- this is only when the schedule is released, need to make the earlyTeamChange smarter -->
              <span data-ng-bind-html="team.displayAbbr | earlyTeamChange:'abbr'"></span>              
            </a>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>    </div>
    <div class="col-12">       
      <!-- Team Schedule Module Start -->
<div class="sib-table-container sib-table-league-schedule" data-ng-cloak>
  <div data-ng-show="moduleLoading" class="preloader">
    <img src="/media/img/loader.gif" /><br/>
  </div>
  <div id="sib-team-schedule" data-ng-show ="!moduleLoading" bindonce data-ng-repeat="group in splits">
    <table class="sib-zebra-stripes" id="sib-league-schedule">
      <thead class="not-sortable">
        <tr class="headers">
          <th class="not-sortable col-time" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1"  data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.time"></th>
          <th class="col-matchup" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.matchup"></th>
          <th class="col-score" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.score"></th>
          <th class="col-location" data-ng-show="!paginate" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.location"></th>
          <th class="col-broadcaster" data-ng-show="group.status == 'Incomplete' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.broadcast"></th>
          <th class="col-location" data-ng-show="paginate && currentpage==2" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.location"></th>
          <th class="col-links" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.links"></th>
        </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody data-ng-repeat="date in group.dates">
        <tr class="caption">
          <td colspan="100%">
            <h6>{{ date.games[0].profile.utcMillis | date:'monthDay' }}</h6>
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr  data-ng-repeat="game in date.games">
          <td class="col-time" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">
            <span bo-show="game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'CNCL' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'PPD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'TBD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == '\u5ef6\u671f' ">{{ game.boxscore.statusDesc  }}</span>
            <span bo-hide="game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'CNCL' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'PPD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'TBD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == '\u5ef6\u671f' ">{{ game.profile.utcMillis | date:'shortTime' }}</span>             
          </td>
          <td class="col-matchup" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1"><a sib-team-urls team="game.awayTeam.profile" bo-href="'/teams/#!/' + game.awayTeam.profile.code" bo-text="game.awayTeam.profile.displayAbbr"></a> @ <a sib-team-urls team="game.homeTeam.profile" bo-href="'/teams/#!/' + game.homeTeam.profile.code " bo-text="game.homeTeam.profile.displayAbbr"></a></td>
          <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">
            <span bo-show="game.boxscore.status > 1"><span bo-class="{'red': game.boxscore.awayScore > game.boxscore.homeScore }" bo-text=" game.boxscore.awayScore"></span> - <span bo-class="{'red': game.boxscore.awayScore < game.boxscore.homeScore }" bo-text=" game.boxscore.homeScore"></span></span>
            <span bo-show="game.boxscore.status == 1">-</span>
          </td>
          <td data-ng-show="!paginate" bo-text="game.profile.arenaName"></td>
          <td  data-ng-show="group.status == 'Incomplete' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">
            <sib-broadcaster-urls broadcasters="game.broadcasters" />
            <span class="broadcaster">
			  <span class="live"><span data-ng-repeat="url in game.urls | filter: { type : 'Live' }" bo-text="url.displayText"></span></span>
			</span> 
          </td>
          <td data-ng-show="paginate && currentpage==2" bo-text="game.profile.arenaName"></td>
          <td class="links" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">
            <sib-game-urls game="game"></sib-game-urls>
          </td>
        </tr>
      </tbody>
    </table>
    <div class="table-footer">
      <div class="pagination" data-ng-show="paginate==true">
          <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=1" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==1}"></a>
          <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=2" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==2}"></a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
<!-- Team Schedule Module End -->    </div>
  </div>
  
</div>
                <!-- End content -->
              </div>
              
              <div class='footer-container' data-ng-show="showFooter">

                <!-- <div class='row stats-site-footer'>
  <div class="col-12 footer">
    <div class='footer-nav hidden-all-sites show-mi'>
      <div class='col-6 explore' >

      <div class='col-6 more'>
        <h4 class='col-12' data-ng-i18next="navbar.more"></h4>

 <footer class= "row">
    <div id= "footer" class= "large-12 columns">
        <p class="show-all-sites hidden-mi copyright clear-fix" data-ng-i18next="[html]footer"></p>    
        <div class="hidden-all-sites show-mi">
            <section id= "block-homepagefooter" class= "block-homepagefooter">
                <div>

        </div>
    </div>
</footer>
